divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife and i were coming back home to georgia after visiting family in south carolina. we were driving on the interstate..it was about 9 pm...i was looking up in the sky and saw some small lights from a distance...i told my wife and she said that it was a plane..well all of a sudden the multi-colered light object we thought was a plane got huge in a matter of seconds and was coming towards us...it seemed like forever, but it probobly lasted about 10 seconds...it looked just like a disc...like the old ufo pics you see...the lights were orange,white,and red...i am very sure that when it headed towards us that it was not a plane!!my wife said oh my god chris look! and we both were terrified...i just stared at it...and then all of a sudden, it vanished...i have always been the skeptic when it comes to "ufo's"...but there was no denying this.
Summary: A huge object came towards my wife and I while we were in the car.
